text: ZALORA | Singapore | ONSITE, REMOTE, VISA ZALORA is an online fashion retailer headquartered in Singapore with millions of customers and 1000+ employees throughout South East Asia. We're expanding our globally distributed DevOps team. You will be using Nix/NixOS to glue together a stack of Go, Memcached, MySQL, PHP, Solr and more. A code check (either an existing project or a test) is the biggest deciding factor. After that we'll chat, call and optionally meet to sort out the details. Apply at http://jobs.engineering.zalora.com/apply/lOd9Ir/Global-DevOp.... Other positions (frontend, backend, Android, iOS, to name a few) are also available at the same site.
